7 Master::Master(DXLPortHandler &port, float protocol_ver, uint16_t malloc_buf_size)
8 : protocol_ver_idx_(2),
9  is_buf_malloced_(false), packet_buf_capacity_(0),
10  last_lib_err_(DXL_LIB_OK)
11 {
12  setPort(port);
13  setPortProtocolVersion(protocol_ver);
14 
15  if(malloc_buf_size > 0){
16  p_packet_buf_ = new uint8_t[malloc_buf_size];
17  if(p_packet_buf_ != nullptr){
18  packet_buf_capacity_ = malloc_buf_size;
19  is_buf_malloced_ = true;
20  }
21  }
22  info_tx_packet_.is_init = false;
23  info_rx_packet_.is_init = false;
24 }

37  packet_buf_capacity_ = malloc_buf_size;

46 bool
47 Master::setPacketBuffer(uint8_t* p_buf, uint16_t buf_capacity)
48 {
49  if(p_buf == nullptr){
50  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
51  return false;
52  }
53  if(packet_buf_capacity_ == 0){
54  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
55  return false;
56  }
57 
58  if(is_buf_malloced_ == true){
59  delete p_packet_buf_;
60  }
61  p_packet_buf_ = p_buf;
62  packet_buf_capacity_ = buf_capacity;
63 
64  return true;
65 }

82 // Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/#protocol
83 bool
84 Master::setPortProtocolVersion(float version)
85 {
86  uint8_t version_idx;
87 
88  if(version == 2.0){
89  version_idx = 2;
90  }else if(version == 1.0){
91  version_idx = 1;
92  }else{
93  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
94  return false;
95  }
96 
97  return setPortProtocolVersionUsingIndex(version_idx);
98 }

101 bool
102 Master::setPortProtocolVersionUsingIndex(uint8_t version_idx)
103 {
104  if(version_idx != 2 && version_idx != 1){
105  return false;
106  }
107  protocol_ver_idx_ = version_idx;
108 
109  return true;
110 }

150 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#ping
151 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#ping
152 uint8_t
153 Master::ping(uint8_t id, uint8_t *p_recv_id_array, uint8_t recv_array_capacity, uint32_t timeout_ms)
154 {
155  uint8_t ret_id_cnt = 0;
156  uint32_t pre_time_ms;
157  uint8_t rx_param[3];
158 
159  // Parameter exception handling
160  if(p_recv_id_array == nullptr){
161  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
162  return 0;
163  }else if(recv_array_capacity == 0){
164  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
165  return 0;
166  }
167 
168  // Send Ping Instruction
169  if(txInstPacket(id, DXL_INST_PING, nullptr, 0) == true){
170  // Receive Status Packet
171  if(id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
172  if(rxStatusPacket(rx_param, 3, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
173  if(info_rx_packet_.id == id){
174  p_recv_id_array[ret_id_cnt++] = info_rx_packet_.id;
175  }
176  }
177  }else{
178  pre_time_ms = millis();
179  while(ret_id_cnt < recv_array_capacity)
180  {
181  if(rxStatusPacket(rx_param, 3, 3) != nullptr){
182  p_recv_id_array[ret_id_cnt++] = info_rx_packet_.id;
183  }
184 
185  if (millis()-pre_time_ms >= timeout_ms) {
186  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_TIMEOUT;
187  break;
188  }
189  }
190  }
191  }
192 
193  return ret_id_cnt;
194 }
195 
196 uint8_t
197 Master::ping(uint8_t id, InfoFromPing_t *recv_ping_info_array, uint8_t recv_array_cnt, uint32_t timeout_ms)
198 {
199  uint8_t ret_id_cnt = 0;
200  InfoFromPing_t *p_info = recv_ping_info_array;
201  uint32_t pre_time_ms;
202 
203  // Parameter exception handling
204  if(p_info == nullptr){
205  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
206  return 0;
207  }else if(recv_array_cnt == 0){
208  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
209  return 0;
210  }
211 
212  // Send Ping Instruction
213  if(txInstPacket(id, DXL_INST_PING, nullptr, 0) == true){
214  // Receive Status Packet
215  if(id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
216  if(rxStatusPacket((uint8_t*)&p_info[ret_id_cnt].model_number, 3, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
217  if(info_rx_packet_.id == id){
218  p_info[ret_id_cnt++].id = info_rx_packet_.id;
219  }
220  }
221  }else{
222  pre_time_ms = millis();
223  while(ret_id_cnt < recv_array_cnt)
224  {
225  if(rxStatusPacket((uint8_t*)&p_info[ret_id_cnt].model_number, 3, 3) != nullptr){
226  p_info[ret_id_cnt++].id = info_rx_packet_.id;
227  }
228 
229  if (millis()-pre_time_ms >= timeout_ms) {
230  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_TIMEOUT;
231  break;
232  }
233  }
234  }
235  }
236 
237  return ret_id_cnt;
238 }

241 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#read
242 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#read
243 int32_t
244 Master::read(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr, uint16_t addr_length,
245  uint8_t *p_recv_buf, uint16_t recv_buf_capacity, uint32_t timeout_ms)
246 {
247  int32_t ret_param_len = -1;
248  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
249  uint8_t param_len = 0;
250  uint8_t tx_param[4];
251 
252  // Parameter exception handling
253  if(p_recv_buf == nullptr){
254  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
255  }else if(addr_length == 0) {
256  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_ADDR_LENGTH;
257  }else if(recv_buf_capacity < addr_length){
258  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
259  }else if (id == DXL_BROADCAST_ID) {
260  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORT_BROADCAST;
261  }
262  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
263  last_lib_err_ = err;
264  return -1;
265  }
266 
267  // Send Read Instruction
268  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
269  tx_param[param_len++] = addr >> 0;
270  tx_param[param_len++] = addr >> 8;
271  tx_param[param_len++] = addr_length >> 0;
272  tx_param[param_len++] = addr_length >> 8;
273  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
274  tx_param[param_len++] = (uint8_t)addr&0xFF;
275  tx_param[param_len++] = (uint8_t)addr_length&0xFF;
276  }
277  if(txInstPacket(id, DXL_INST_READ, (uint8_t*)tx_param, param_len) == true){
278  if(rxStatusPacket(p_recv_buf, recv_buf_capacity, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
279  ret_param_len = (int32_t)info_rx_packet_.recv_param_len;
280  }
281  }
282 
283  return ret_param_len;
284 }

286 
287 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#write
288 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#write
289 bool
290 Master::write(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr,
291  const uint8_t *p_data, uint16_t data_length, uint32_t timeout_ms)
292 {
293  bool ret = false;
294 
295  // Send Write Instruction
296  if(writeNoResp(id, addr, p_data, data_length) == true){
297  // Receive Status Packet
298  if(id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
299  if(rxStatusPacket(nullptr, 0, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
300  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
301  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0 || info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0x80){
302  ret = true;
303  }
304  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
305  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0
306  || (info_rx_packet_.err_idx & (1<<DXL1_0_ERR_INPUT_VOLTAGE_BIT
307  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERHEATING_BIT
308  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERLOAD_BIT)) != 0){
309  ret = true;
310  }
311  }
312  }
313  }else{
314  ret = true;
315  }
316  }
317 
318  return ret;
319 }
320 
321 
322 bool
323 Master::writeNoResp(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr, const uint8_t *p_data, uint16_t data_length)
324 {
325  bool ret = false;
326  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
327  uint8_t param_len = 0;
328 
329  // Parameter exception handling
330  if(p_data == nullptr || p_port_ == nullptr){
331  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
332  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
333  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
334  }else if(data_length == 0) {
335  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_DATA_LENGTH;
336  }
337  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
338  last_lib_err_ = err;
339  return false;
340  }
341 
342  // Send Write Instruction
343  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
344  param_len = 2;
345  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
346  param_len = 1;
347  }
348  begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, id, protocol_ver_idx_,
349  DXL_INST_WRITE, 0, p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_);
350  add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)&addr, param_len);
351  param_len = data_length;
352  add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)p_data, param_len);
353  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
354  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
355  p_port_->write(info_tx_packet_.p_packet_buf, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
356  ret = true;
357  }
358 
359  last_lib_err_ = err;
360 
361  return ret;
362 }

365 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#reg-write
366 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#reg-write
367 bool
368 Master::regWrite(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr,
369  const uint8_t *p_data, uint16_t data_length, uint32_t timeout_ms)
370 {
371  bool ret = false;
372  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
373  uint8_t param_len = 0;
374 
375  // Parameter exception handling
376  if(p_data == nullptr || p_port_ == nullptr){
377  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
378  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
379  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
380  }else if(data_length == 0) {
381  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_DATA_LENGTH;
382  }
383  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
384  last_lib_err_ = err;
385  return false;
386  }
387 
388  // Send Write Instruction
389  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
390  param_len = 2;
391  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
392  param_len = 1;
393  }
394  begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, id, protocol_ver_idx_,
395  DXL_INST_REG_WRITE, 0, p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_);
396  add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)&addr, param_len);
397  param_len = data_length;
398  add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)p_data, param_len);
399  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
400  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
401  p_port_->write(info_tx_packet_.p_packet_buf, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
402 
403  // Receive Status Packet
404  if(id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
405  if(rxStatusPacket(nullptr, 0, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
406  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
407  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0 || info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0x80){
408  ret = true;
409  }
410  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
411  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0
412  || (info_rx_packet_.err_idx & (1<<DXL1_0_ERR_INPUT_VOLTAGE_BIT
413  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERHEATING_BIT
414  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERLOAD_BIT)) != 0){
415  ret = true;
416  }
417  }
418  }
419  }else{
420  ret = true;
421  }
422  }
423 
424  last_lib_err_ = err;
425 
426  return ret;
427 }

430 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#action
431 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#action
432 bool
433 Master::action(uint8_t id, uint32_t timeout_ms)
434 {
435  bool ret = false;
436 
437  // Send Reboot Instruction
438  if(txInstPacket(id, DXL_INST_ACTION, nullptr, 0) == true){
439  if(id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
440  if(rxStatusPacket(nullptr, 0, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
441  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
442  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0 || info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0x80){
443  ret = true;
444  }
445  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
446  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0
447  || (info_rx_packet_.err_idx & (1<<DXL1_0_ERR_INPUT_VOLTAGE_BIT
448  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERHEATING_BIT
449  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERLOAD_BIT)) != 0){
450  ret = true;
451  }
452  }
453  }
454  }else{
455  ret = true;
456  }
457  }
458 
459  return ret;
460 }

480  ret = true;
481  }
482  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
483  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0
484  || (info_rx_packet_.err_idx & (1<<DXL1_0_ERR_INPUT_VOLTAGE_BIT
485  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERHEATING_BIT
486  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERLOAD_BIT)) != 0){
487  ret = true;

500 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#reboot
501 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#reboot
502 bool
503 Master::reboot(uint8_t id, uint32_t timeout_ms)

511  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
512  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0 || info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0x80){
513  ret = true;
514  }
515  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){

518  | 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_OVERHEATING_BIT

533 // (Protocol 1.0) Not Supported
534 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#clear
535 bool
536 Master::clear(uint8_t id, uint8_t option, uint32_t ex_option, uint32_t timeout_ms)
537 {
538  bool ret = false;
539  uint8_t tx_param[5];
540 
541  // Parameter exception handling
542  if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2){
543  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
544  return false;
545  }
546 
547  // http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#clear
548  tx_param[0] = option;
549  if(option == 0x01){
550  tx_param[1] = 0x44;
551  tx_param[2] = 0x58;
552  tx_param[3] = 0x4C;
553  tx_param[4] = 0x22;
554  }else{
555  memcpy(&tx_param[1], &ex_option, 4);
556  }
557 
558  // Send Reboot Instruction
559  if(txInstPacket(id, DXL_INST_CLEAR, tx_param, 5) == true){
560  if(id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
561  if(rxStatusPacket(nullptr, 0, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
562  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
563  if(info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0 || info_rx_packet_.err_idx == 0x80){
564  ret = true;
565  }
566  }
567  }
568  }else{
569  ret = true;
570  }
571  }
572 
573  return ret;
574 }
575 
576 
577 
578 // (Protocol 1.0) Not Supported
579 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#sync-read
580 uint8_t
581 Master::syncRead(InfoSyncReadInst_t* p_info, uint32_t timeout_ms)
582 {
583  uint8_t i, recv_cnt = 0;
584  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
585  uint8_t tx_param[4], param_len = 0;
586  uint8_t* p_packet_buf = nullptr;
587  uint16_t packet_buf_cap;
588  XELInfoSyncRead_t* p_xel;
589 
590  // Parameter exception handling
591  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
592  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
593  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
594  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
595  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2){
596  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
597  }
598  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
599  last_lib_err_ = err;
600  return 0;
601  }
602 
603  if(p_info->packet.p_buf != nullptr){
604  p_packet_buf = p_info->packet.p_buf;
605  packet_buf_cap = p_info->packet.buf_capacity;
606  }else{
607  p_packet_buf = p_packet_buf_;
608  packet_buf_cap = packet_buf_capacity_;
609  }
610 
611  if(p_info->packet.p_buf == nullptr && info_tx_packet_.inst_idx != DXL_INST_SYNC_READ){
612  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
613  }
614 
615  if(p_info->packet.is_completed == false || p_info->is_info_changed == true){
616  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, DXL_BROADCAST_ID, protocol_ver_idx_,
617  DXL_INST_SYNC_READ, 0, p_packet_buf, packet_buf_cap);
618  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
619  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr >> 0;
620  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr >> 8;
621  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr_length >> 0;
622  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr_length >> 8;
623  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, tx_param, param_len);
624  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
625  for(i=0; i<p_info->xel_count; i++){
626  p_xel = &p_info->p_xels[i];
627  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, &p_xel->id, 1);
628  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
629  break;
630  }
631  }
632  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
633  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
634  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
635  p_info->packet.gen_length = info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length;
636  p_info->packet.is_completed = true;
637  p_info->is_info_changed = false;
638  }
639  }
640  }
641  }
642  }
643 
644  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
645  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf, p_info->packet.gen_length);
646 
647  for(i=0; i<p_info->xel_count; i++)
648  {
649  p_xel = &p_info->p_xels[i];
650  if(rxStatusPacket(p_xel->p_recv_buf, p_info->addr_length, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
651  if(info_rx_packet_.id == p_xel->id){
652  p_xel->error = info_rx_packet_.err_idx;
653  recv_cnt++;
654  }else{
655  break;
656  }
657  }else{
658  break;
659  }
660  }
661  }else{
662  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
663  }
664  last_lib_err_ = err;
665 
666  return recv_cnt;
667 }
668 
669 
670 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#sync-write
671 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#sync-write
672 bool
673 Master::syncWrite(InfoSyncWriteInst_t* p_info)
674 {
675  bool ret = false;
676  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
677  uint8_t i, tx_param[4], param_len = 0;
678  uint8_t* p_packet_buf = nullptr;
679  uint16_t packet_buf_cap;
680  XELInfoSyncWrite_t* p_xel;
681 
682  // Parameter exception handling
683  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
684  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
685  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
686  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
687  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2 && protocol_ver_idx_ != 1){
688  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
689  }
690  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
691  last_lib_err_ = err;
692  return false;
693  }
694 
695  if(p_info->packet.p_buf != nullptr){
696  p_packet_buf = p_info->packet.p_buf;
697  packet_buf_cap = p_info->packet.buf_capacity;
698  }else{
699  p_packet_buf = p_packet_buf_;
700  packet_buf_cap = packet_buf_capacity_;
701  }
702 
703  if(p_info->packet.p_buf == nullptr && info_tx_packet_.inst_idx != DXL_INST_SYNC_WRITE){
704  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
705  }
706 
707  if(p_info->packet.is_completed == false || p_info->is_info_changed == true){
708  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, DXL_BROADCAST_ID, protocol_ver_idx_,
709  DXL_INST_SYNC_WRITE, 0, p_packet_buf, packet_buf_cap);
710  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
711  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
712  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr >> 0;
713  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr >> 8;
714  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr_length >> 0;
715  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr_length >> 8;
716  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
717  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr & 0xFF;
718  tx_param[param_len++] = p_info->addr_length & 0xFF;
719  }
720  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, tx_param, param_len);
721  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
722  for(i=0; i<p_info->xel_count; i++){
723  p_xel = &p_info->p_xels[i];
724  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, &p_xel->id, 1);
725  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
726  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, p_xel->p_data, p_info->addr_length);
727  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
728  break;
729  }
730  }else{
731  break;
732  }
733  }
734  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
735  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
736  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
737  p_info->packet.gen_length = info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length;
738  p_info->packet.is_completed = true;
739  p_info->is_info_changed = false;
740  }
741  }
742  }
743  }
744  }
745 
746  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
747  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf, p_info->packet.gen_length);
748  ret = true;
749  }else{
750  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
751  }
752  last_lib_err_ = err;
753 
754  return ret;
755 }
756 
757 
758 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#bulk-read
759 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#bulk-read
760 uint8_t
761 Master::bulkRead(InfoBulkReadInst_t* p_info, uint32_t timeout_ms)
762 {
763  uint8_t i, recv_cnt = 0;
764  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
765  uint8_t tx_param[5], param_len = 0;
766  uint8_t* p_packet_buf = nullptr;
767  uint16_t packet_buf_cap;
768  XELInfoBulkRead_t* p_xel;
769 
770  // Parameter exception handling
771  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
772  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
773  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
774  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
775  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2 && protocol_ver_idx_ != 1){
776  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
777  }
778  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
779  last_lib_err_ = err;
780  return 0;
781  }
782 
783  if(p_info->packet.p_buf != nullptr){
784  p_packet_buf = p_info->packet.p_buf;
785  packet_buf_cap = p_info->packet.buf_capacity;
786  }else{
787  p_packet_buf = p_packet_buf_;
788  packet_buf_cap = packet_buf_capacity_;
789  }
790 
791  if(p_info->packet.p_buf == nullptr && info_tx_packet_.inst_idx != DXL_INST_BULK_READ){
792  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
793  }
794 
795  if(p_info->packet.is_completed == false || p_info->is_info_changed == true){
796  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, DXL_BROADCAST_ID, protocol_ver_idx_,
797  DXL_INST_BULK_READ, 0, p_packet_buf, packet_buf_cap);
798  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1 && err == DXL_LIB_OK){
799  tx_param[0] = 0x00;
800  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)tx_param, 1);
801  }
802  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
803  for(i=0; i<p_info->xel_count; i++){
804  p_xel = &p_info->p_xels[i];
805  param_len = 0;
806  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
807  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->id;
808  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 0;
809  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 8;
810  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr_length >> 0;
811  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr_length >> 8;
812  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
813  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->id;
814  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr & 0xFF;
815  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr_length & 0xFF;
816  }
817  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, tx_param, param_len);
818  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
819  break;
820  }
821  }
822  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
823  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
824  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
825  p_info->packet.gen_length = info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length;
826  p_info->packet.is_completed = true;
827  p_info->is_info_changed = false;
828  }
829  }
830  }
831  }
832 
833  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
834  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf, p_info->packet.gen_length);
835 
836  for(i=0; i<p_info->xel_count; i++)
837  {
838  p_xel = &p_info->p_xels[i];
839  if(rxStatusPacket(p_xel->p_recv_buf, p_xel->addr_length, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
840  if(info_rx_packet_.id == p_xel->id){
841  p_xel->error = info_rx_packet_.err_idx;
842  recv_cnt++;
843  }else{
844  break;
845  }
846  }else{
847  break;
848  }
849  }
850  }else{
851  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
852  }
853  last_lib_err_ = err;
854 
855  return recv_cnt;
856 }

859 // (Protocol 1.0) Not Supported
860 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#bulk-write
861 bool
862 Master::bulkWrite(InfoBulkWriteInst_t* p_info)
863 {
864  bool ret = false;
865  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
866  uint8_t i, tx_param[5], param_len = 0;
867  uint8_t* p_packet_buf = nullptr;
868  uint16_t packet_buf_cap;
869  XELInfoBulkWrite_t* p_xel;
870 
871  // Parameter exception handling
872  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
873  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
874  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
875  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
876  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2){
877  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
878  }
879  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
880  last_lib_err_ = err;
881  return 0;
882  }
883 
884  if(p_info->packet.p_buf != nullptr){
885  p_packet_buf = p_info->packet.p_buf;
886  packet_buf_cap = p_info->packet.buf_capacity;
887  }else{
888  p_packet_buf = p_packet_buf_;
889  packet_buf_cap = packet_buf_capacity_;
890  }
891 
892  if(p_info->packet.p_buf == nullptr && info_tx_packet_.inst_idx != DXL_INST_BULK_WRITE){
893  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
894  }
895 
896  if(p_info->packet.is_completed == false || p_info->is_info_changed == true){
897  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, DXL_BROADCAST_ID, protocol_ver_idx_,
898  DXL_INST_BULK_WRITE, 0, p_packet_buf, packet_buf_cap);
899  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
900  for(i=0; i<p_info->xel_count; i++){
901  p_xel = &p_info->p_xels[i];
902  param_len = 0;
903  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->id;
904  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 0;
905  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 8;
906  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr_length >> 0;
907  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr_length >> 8;
908  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, tx_param, param_len);
909  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
910  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, p_xel->p_data, p_xel->addr_length);
911  }
912  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
913  break;
914  }
915  }
916  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
917  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
918  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
919  p_info->packet.gen_length = info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length;
920  p_info->packet.is_completed = true;
921  p_info->is_info_changed = false;
922  }
923  }
924  }
925  }
926 
927  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
928  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf, p_info->packet.gen_length);
929  ret = true;
930  }else{
931  p_info->packet.is_completed = false;
932  }
933  last_lib_err_ = err;
934 
935  return ret;
936 }

940 // (Protocol 1.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#error
941 // (Protocol 2.0) Refer to http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#error
942 uint8_t
943 Master::getLastStatusPacketError() const
944 {
945  return info_rx_packet_.err_idx;
946 }

949 DXLLibErrorCode_t
950 Master::getLastLibErrCode() const
951 {
952  return last_lib_err_;
953 }

955 void
956 Master::setLastLibErrCode(DXLLibErrorCode_t err_code)
957 {
958  last_lib_err_ = err_code;
959 }
960 
961 
962 bool
963 Master::txInstPacket(uint8_t id, uint8_t inst_idx, uint8_t *p_param, uint16_t param_len)
964 {
965  bool ret = false;
966  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
967 
968  // Parameter exception handling
969  if(p_port_ == nullptr
970  || (param_len > 0 && p_param == nullptr)){
971  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
972  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
973  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
974  }else if(inst_idx == DXL_INST_STATUS){
975  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
976  }
977  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
978  last_lib_err_ = err;
979  return false;
980  }
981 
982  // Send Instruction Packet
983  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, id, protocol_ver_idx_,
984  inst_idx, 0, p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_);
985  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
986  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, p_param, param_len);
987  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
988  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
989  }
990  }
991  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
992  if(p_port_->write(info_tx_packet_.p_packet_buf, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length)
993  == info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length)
994  {
995  ret = true;
996  }else{
997  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_WRITE;
998  }
999  }
1000 
1001  last_lib_err_ = err;
1002 
1003  return ret;
1004 }
1005 
1006 
1007 const InfoToParseDXLPacket_t*
1008 Master::rxStatusPacket(uint8_t* p_param_buf, uint16_t param_buf_cap, uint32_t timeout_ms)
1009 {
1010  InfoToParseDXLPacket_t *p_ret = nullptr;
1011  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
1012  uint32_t pre_time_ms;
1013 
1014  // Parameter exception handling
1015  if(p_port_ == nullptr
1016  || (param_buf_cap > 0 && p_param_buf == nullptr)){
1017  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
1018  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
1019  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
1020  }
1021  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
1022  last_lib_err_ = err;
1023  return nullptr;
1024  }
1025 
1026  // Receive Status Packet
1027  err = begin_parse_dxl_packet(&info_rx_packet_, protocol_ver_idx_, p_param_buf, param_buf_cap);
1028  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1029  pre_time_ms = millis();
1030  while(1)
1031  {
1032  if(p_port_->available() > 0){
1033  err = parse_dxl_packet(&info_rx_packet_, p_port_->read());
1034  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1035  if((protocol_ver_idx_ == 2 && info_rx_packet_.inst_idx == DXL_INST_STATUS)
1036  || protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
1037  p_ret = &info_rx_packet_;
1038  break;
1039  }
1040  }else if(err != DXL_LIB_PROCEEDING){
1041  break;
1042  }
1043  }
1044 
1045  if (millis()-pre_time_ms >= timeout_ms) {
1046  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_TIMEOUT;
1047  break;
1048  }
1049  }
1050  }
1051 
1052  last_lib_err_ = err;
1053 
1054  return p_ret;
1055 }
1056 
1057 
1058 
1059 
1060 // >> Legacy (Deprecated since v0.4.0)
1061 bool Master::syncRead(const ParamForSyncReadInst_t &param_info, RecvInfoFromStatusInst_t &recv_info, uint32_t timeout_ms)
1062 {
1063  bool ret = false;
1064  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
1065  uint8_t i, tx_param[4], param_len = 0;
1066 
1067  // Parameter exception handling
1068  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
1069  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
1070  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
1071  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
1072  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2){
1073  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
1074  }
1075  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
1076  last_lib_err_ = err;
1077  return false;
1078  }
1079 
1080  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, DXL_BROADCAST_ID, protocol_ver_idx_,
1081  DXL_INST_SYNC_READ, 0, p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_);
1082  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1083  tx_param[param_len++] = param_info.addr >> 0;
1084  tx_param[param_len++] = param_info.addr >> 8;
1085  tx_param[param_len++] = param_info.length >> 0;
1086  tx_param[param_len++] = param_info.length >> 8;
1087  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, tx_param, param_len);
1088  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1089  for(i=0; i<param_info.id_count; i++){
1090  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)&param_info.xel[i].id, 1);
1091  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
1092  break;
1093  }
1094  }
1095  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1096  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
1097  }
1098  }
1099  }
1100 
1101  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1102  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf_, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
1103 
1104  for(i=0; i<param_info.id_count; i++)
1105  {
1106  if(rxStatusPacket(recv_info.xel[i].data, DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
1107  if(info_rx_packet_.id == param_info.xel[i].id){
1108  recv_info.xel[i].id = info_rx_packet_.id;
1109  recv_info.xel[i].error = info_rx_packet_.err_idx;
1110  recv_info.xel[i].length = info_rx_packet_.recv_param_len;
1111  }else{
1112  break;
1113  }
1114  }else{
1115  break;
1116  }
1117  }
1118  recv_info.id_count = i;
1119  if(recv_info.id_count > 0){
1120  ret = true;
1121  }
1122  }
1123  last_lib_err_ = err;
1124 
1125  return ret;
1126 }
1127

1129 bool Master::syncWrite(const ParamForSyncWriteInst_t &param_info)

1180  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf_, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
1181  ret = true;
1182  }
1183  last_lib_err_ = err;
1184 
1185  return ret;
1186 }

1188 
1189 bool Master::bulkRead(const ParamForBulkReadInst_t &param_info, RecvInfoFromStatusInst_t &recv_info, uint32_t timeout_ms)
1190 {
1191  bool ret = false;
1192  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
1193  uint8_t i, tx_param[5], param_len = 0;
1194  const XelInfoForBulkReadParam_t* p_xel;
1195 
1196  // Parameter exception handling
1197  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
1198  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
1199  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
1200  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
1201  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2 && protocol_ver_idx_ != 1){
1202  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
1203  }
1204  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
1205  last_lib_err_ = err;
1206  return 0;
1207  }
1208 
1209  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, DXL_BROADCAST_ID, protocol_ver_idx_,
1210  DXL_INST_BULK_READ, 0, p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_);
1211  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1 && err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1212  tx_param[0] = 0x00;
1213  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)tx_param, 1);
1214  }
1215  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1216  for(i=0; i<param_info.id_count; i++){
1217  p_xel = &param_info.xel[i];
1218  param_len = 0;
1219  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2){
1220  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->id;
1221  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 0;
1222  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 8;
1223  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->length >> 0;
1224  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->length >> 8;
1225  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
1226  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->id;
1227  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr & 0xFF;
1228  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->length & 0xFF;
1229  }
1230  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, tx_param, param_len);
1231  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
1232  break;
1233  }
1234  }
1235  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1236  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
1237  }
1238  }
1239 
1240  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1241  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf_, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
1242 
1243  for(i=0; i<param_info.id_count; i++)
1244  {
1245  p_xel = &param_info.xel[i];
1246  if(rxStatusPacket(recv_info.xel[i].data, p_xel->length, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
1247  if(info_rx_packet_.id == param_info.xel[i].id){
1248  recv_info.xel[recv_info.id_count].id = info_rx_packet_.id;
1249  recv_info.xel[recv_info.id_count].error = info_rx_packet_.err_idx;
1250  recv_info.xel[recv_info.id_count].length = info_rx_packet_.recv_param_len;
1251  recv_info.id_count++;
1252  }else{
1253  break;
1254  }
1255  }else{
1256  break;
1257  }
1258  }
1259  if(i == param_info.id_count){
1260  ret = true;
1261  }
1262  }
1263  last_lib_err_ = err;
1264 
1265 
1266  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1267  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf_, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
1268 
1269  for(i=0; i<param_info.id_count; i++)
1270  {
1271  if(rxStatusPacket(recv_info.xel[i].data, DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE, timeout_ms) != nullptr){
1272  if(info_rx_packet_.id == param_info.xel[i].id){
1273  recv_info.xel[i].id = info_rx_packet_.id;
1274  recv_info.xel[i].error = info_rx_packet_.err_idx;
1275  recv_info.xel[i].length = info_rx_packet_.recv_param_len;
1276  }else{
1277  break;
1278  }
1279  }else{
1280  break;
1281  }
1282  }
1283  recv_info.id_count = i;
1284  if(recv_info.id_count > 0){
1285  ret = true;
1286  }
1287  }
1288 
1289  return ret;
1290 }
1291 
1292 
1293 bool Master::bulkWrite(const ParamForBulkWriteInst_t &param_info)
1294 {
1295  bool ret = false;
1296  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
1297  uint8_t i, tx_param[5], param_len = 0;
1298  const XelInfoForBulkWriteParam_t* p_xel;
1299 
1300  // Parameter exception handling
1301  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
1302  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
1303  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
1304  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
1305  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 2){
1306  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
1307  }
1308  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
1309  last_lib_err_ = err;
1310  return 0;
1311  }
1312 
1313  err = begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, DXL_BROADCAST_ID, protocol_ver_idx_,
1314  DXL_INST_BULK_WRITE, 0, p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_);
1315  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1316  for(i=0; i<param_info.id_count; i++){
1317  p_xel = &param_info.xel[i];
1318  param_len = 0;
1319  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->id;
1320  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 0;
1321  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->addr >> 8;
1322  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->length >> 0;
1323  tx_param[param_len++] = p_xel->length >> 8;
1324  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, tx_param, param_len);
1325  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1326  err = add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, (uint8_t*)p_xel->data, p_xel->length);
1327  }
1328  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
1329  break;
1330  }
1331  }
1332  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1333  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
1334  }
1335  }
1336 
1337  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
1338  p_port_->write(p_packet_buf_, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
1339  ret = true;
1340  }
1341  last_lib_err_ = err;
1342 
1343  return ret;
1344 }
